ComicInfo.Summary:
FINAL ISSUE! Dr. Crowe's daring, supernatural adventures come to close with three thrilling stories from across the globe! First, Dr. Crowe ventures into the unforgiving swamps of Louisiana in search of the legendary soul-sucking bogmen! Then it's off to Ireland where Dr. Crowe is called in to rescue an unsuspecting town from the infamous Orcadian devil known as the Nuckelavee. Finally, Dr. Crowe has been captured by Japanese death cult who vows to unleash an undead, lightning-eating demon! Can the world-renowned occult scientist escape their clutches?
Note: The digital edition (10/25/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
